rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Leave clocks on British Summer Time all year round: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642905

End the clocks going back. Keep GMT as standard time all year round: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/645060
